message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. While I can't disclose specifics about its worth, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1000000 to me. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. Consider it carefully, as I have another interested party ready to purchase it for $1000000 if you decline.
